name: dropgate-cli
description: Command-line interface for Dropgate file sharing.

scripts.pkg: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs -o dropgate --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:win: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-win-x64 -o dropgate --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:mac: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-macos-x64,node20-macos-arm64 -o dropgate --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-linux-x64,node20-linux-arm64 -o dropgate --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-win-x64,node20-macos-x64,node20-macos-arm64,node20-linux-x64,node20-linux-arm64 -o dropgate --compress GZip

author: Diamond Digital Development <https://diamonddigital.dev>
